games.longDescription: Strong racing cars, detailed modification options, and tough races are waiting for you with the Grand City Racing game! There are three game modes: Racing, Challenge, and Free Drive...

games.shortDescription: Temple Run 2 is a thrilling endless runner with obstacles, coins, and power-ups.

games.longDescription: Subway Surfers is a classic endless running game where you dash through train tracks, dodge obstacles, and collect coins while being chased by a grumpy inspector and his dog. Unlock new characters, hoverboards, and power-ups to extend your run. The game features fast-paced gameplay with colorful graphics and smooth animations. How to play? Move Left: "Left Arrow" or "Swipe Left" Move Right: "Right Arrow" or "Swipe Right" Jump: "Up Arrow" or "Swipe Up" Slide: "Down Arrow" or "Swipe Down" Activate Power-up: "Spacebar" or "Tap Power Icon"
games.shortDescription: Dash, dodge, and surf your way through train tracks in this fast-paced endless runner.
games.tags: endless, runner, arcade, casual, pc, embedded
games.title: Subway Surfers
